title: New York Times Tech Workers Vote to Certify Union - The New York Times
content:
1. New York Times Tech Workers Vote to Certify Union  The New York Times
  2. Hundreds of New York Times Tech Staffers Vote to Unionize  The Wall Street Journal
  3. New York Times tech workers vote to unionize  Axios
  4. New York Times tech workers vote to join union  Reuters
  5. After more than 10 months of public organizing, New York Times tech workers vote 404-88 to unionize  Poynter
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The ratification, with about 80 percent of ballots in favor, makes it the largest tech union in the United States with collective bargaining rights.
